metadata.title: CVE-2023-6110 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
deleting a non existing access rule deletes another existing access rulein its scope

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6110` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-openstackclient - 6.3.0-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-openstackclient package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.0-0ubuntu1').
